mapper.insert: INSERT INTO linkjobs_scrap (scrap_boolean, member_id, hire_announcement_no, scrap_date) SELECT scrap_boolean AS scrapBoolean, member_id AS memberId, hire_announcement_no AS hireAnnouncementNo, scrap_date AS scrapDate FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT scrap_no FROM linkjobs_scrap where member_id=#{memberId} AND hire_announcement_no=#{hireAnnouncementNo})
